wikipedia_page.main: Ross Eccles, (born 13 November 1937), is a contemporary English artist and painter. He has been based in Dublin, Ireland since 1971, and exhibits there regularly. He has also exhibited his work in the UK, France and the US.

response: *Ross Eccles (born 1937), contemporary artist; many of his paintings feature Blackburn and Lancashire scenes and landmarks
*Ross Eccles (born 1937) – contemporary artist, English-born but based in Ireland since 1971
